Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11976121] Fungi:Penicillium digitatum PHI-26 (MIC=60 μM, IC50=36 ± 6 μM), Penicillium italicum PHI-1 (MIC=80 μM, IC50=52 ± 5 μM), Botrytis cinerea CECT2100 (MIC=80 μM, IC50=43 ± 14 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antifungal activity against Penicillium digitatum PHI-26, Penicillium italicum PHI-1, Botrytis cinerea CECT2100. All residues of PAF19 are D-animo acids.

Literature.Title: Identification of novel hexapeptides bioactive against phytopathogenic fungi through screening of a synthetic peptide combinatorial library.
Literature.Author: López-García B, Pérez-Payá E, Marcos JF.
